CustomField.description: In approximately 200 words, demonstrate an integrated approach to your envelope design. Provide a complete envelope design to include thermal breaks, insulation, continuous air barriers, external sun control devices, hygrothermal analysis and green roof potential Include in the integrated design narrative.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Demonstrate an integrated approach to your envelope design; include thermal breaks, insulation, continuous air barriers, external sun control devices, hydrothermal analysis and green roof potential.
CustomField.label: Envelope Design Narrative
